hero.headline2: Prove What You Know. Be Recognized.
hero.subtitle1: With digital badges, every skill you master becomes part of your professional story.

metadata.description: Mark the information required in every open badge.
metadata.longHelp: Open badges must include key metadata fields such as the badge type, issue date, criteria, and achievement description. These ensure the badge is verifiable and understandable to recipients and reviewers.

task.genericMistake: This information is not required in every badge.
task.option1.explanation: The badge recipient name is often private or anonymized; it's not required in every badge.
task.option6.explanation: Email encryption is optional depending on the system. It’s not mandatory metadata.
